Module: selfcal_plots

Quick search

Module: selfcal_maps¶

This script contains functionality to plot the selfcal images

selfcal.selfcal_maps.convert_mir2fits(mir_name, fits_name)[source]¶

This function converts a miriad image to fits

selfcal.selfcal_maps.create_selfcal_maps(mir_image_list, qa_selfcal_beam_dir, plot_residuals=False, selfcal_type='phase')[source]¶

This function creates plots for the selfcal maps.

selfcal.selfcal_maps.get_selfcal_maps(obs_id, qa_selfcal_dir, trigger_mode=False)[source]¶

This function goes through the images available and plots them.

It will convert the miriad images temporarily into fits. The fits files will be delelted afterwards. At the moment only the image and residual is taken into account.

selfcal.selfcal_maps.plot_selfcal_maps(fits_name, qa_selfcal_beam_dir, plot_residuals=False)[source]¶

This function plots the selfcal maps
